review: Great product!! Fire TV has made online streaming so simple even my 5 year old son knows how to work it. The interface is user friendly and is really fast. The voice search is a nice feature I just wish it would find show within Hulu and Netflix not just Amazon Prime.  Overall this device helped my drop cable and go to online streaming only.  Thinking about adding another Fire TV or even the Fire stick to all my TV's.
